revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A treatise on the theory and management of ulcers : with a dissertation on white swelling of the joints : to which is prefixed, an essay on the chirurgical treatme..."
revision.text: Possibly: A treatise on the theory and management of ulcers : with a dissertation on white swelling of the joints : to which is prefixed, an essay on the chirurgical treatment of inflammation and its consequences / by Benjamin Bell, member of the College of Surgeons of Edinburgh, and one of the Surgeons to the Royal Infirmary of that City. (Edinburgh : Printed for Charles Elliot, and sold by Thomas Cadell, London, M,DCC,LXXVIII. [1778]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1875856~S1
